job_description:
Holmusk, a 2019 World Economic Forum Technology Pioneer, is building a leading real-world evidence platform in mental health. We leverage data and advanced analytics to accelerate research and improve outcomes in psychiatry across pharma, healthcare providers, and payers.

We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist to contribute to and lead projects that leverage our real-world mental health database and advanced analytics to generate real-world evidence (RWE).

Responsibilities
• Design, develop, and implement high-quality real-world data (RWD) studies.
• Work closely with the client team to identify research questions, appropriate methodology and clear deliverables.
• Write scientific study proposals and reports.
• Prepare datasets for downstream analysis, implement statistical methods, and interpret study results.
• Prepare and present key research insights and findings using written reports and visual representatives to colleagues and clients.
• Work in a multidisciplinary team.

What We're Looking For
• Relevant post-graduate qualification (MSc/PhD in Epidemiology, Psychiatry, or related discipline)
• 3+ years of experience programming experience with R and/or Python
• Experience in epidemiological and medical statistics methods employed in observational research (experience in psychometrics, health economics is a plus)
• Experience of data cleaning and wrangling
• Working knowledge of SQL and version control (git preferred)
• Familiarity with a client-facing, healthcare-related environment is a plus (pharmaceutical companies, MedTech companies, consultancies)
• Experience in scientific writing and project management
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills

What's In It For You
• You will be working alongside smart and easy-to-work with people who are passionate about what they do. We are a group of people who love solving challenging problems.
• You will gain the opportunity to work with large pharmaceutical companies in their real-world drug evidence generation.
• We are a mature start-up, in the process of scaling up with room for ownership and growth.

At Holmusk we take pride in our diverse workforce and inclusive culture. We believe it takes all kinds of people to build the best products and bring real change to the healthcare space.

Qualifications: Relevant post-graduate qualification (MSc/PhD in Epidemiology, Psychiatry, or related discipline)
3+ years of experience programming experience with R and/or Python
Experience of data cleaning and wrangling
Experience in scientific writing and project management
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Responsibilities: Design, develop, and implement high-quality real-world data (RWD) studies
Work closely with the client team to identify research questions, appropriate methodology and clear deliverables
Write scientific study proposals and reports
Prepare datasets for downstream analysis, implement statistical methods, and interpret study results
Prepare and present key research insights and findings using written reports and visual representatives to colleagues and clients
Benefits: You will be working alongside smart and easy-to-work with people who are passionate about what they do
